divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home eastbound on cypresswood dr. between TC Jester and Kuykendahl. Saw bright light in the sky, thought first it was a helicopter,it was pulsating blue oval shaped. It went straight then changed direction back and forth, up and down, it also hovered for a moment and then I lost sight behind the trees. It moved with different speeds.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: driving home eastbound on cypresswood dr.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Spring
There were no other sightings in Spring on or around February 22nd 2013
